Articles.Content: in da train !!!

> 
> Actually I am ok with that. Its gonna take a few days/weeks for all the mods I want to update. Even if 1.0 just runs for 30 min at a time before crashing is enough for me, just to play about a bit in the creative to get the feel for the new parts, systems.

Well, you are proboably the exception then. I for one am glad they will be on hand to iron out bugs.

> 
> Its not that bad with SSD. Also, Squad said they did a major optimisation on loading times, vanilla should load about 40% faster.

Didn't know about the load time optimisation.

Is there anything this update doesn't have?

> 
> Is there anything this update doesn't have?

Seems that eyecandy like clouds, etc (and such useless things like lifesupport) didnÃ‚Â´t make it in and I think there are a lot of other things ... but there is surely a mod for everything ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

> 
> Didn't know about the load time optimisation.
> Is there anything this update doesn't have?

A Delta-V readout.

> 
> A Delta-V readout.

Are we 100% sure of that? Pretty sure we were told we wouldn't get air brakes/spoilers, but we seem to be getting those now.

We will cross over in about two minutes into superplaidic velocities! 

Two minutes isn't particularly special, that's just when the transition happens.
We have made the transition. Repeat, we have made the transition!

I had to google that one ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Edit: And the result returned this thread. Did you just made that word on spot? Also how come no one else on the planet has come up wit that before you??

I just woke up and I'm like people are already hyping?

If it's not too early for you it's not too early for me.

Hype! Whiplash from the transition! Hype!
We are now travelling at 1.23 times the speed of Plaidosity
12:05 here. I about to fix some lunch. KSP community is spread across the globe. The HYPE never sleeps!!
7: 20 PM here where I live, I might just wake up to 1.0.
The hype nose cone has melted. Help me!

> 
> The hype nose cone has melted. Help me!

You knew the risks, it was your fault. I'm sorry, you'll be remembered as a hero.

> 
> I had to google that one ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> Edit: And the result returned this thread. Did you just made that word on spot? Also how come no one else on the planet has come up wit that before you??

It's a play on words based on a [Spaceballs reference](https://youtu.be/mk7VWcuVOf0?t=90).

Just under six hours 'til the streaming starts. I have to say the lack of Squadcast certainly took some of the hype out of me.

Maybe there'll be a riddle today to help build the hype pressure.

Happy landings!

> 
> Just under six hours 'til the streaming starts. I have to say the lack of Squadcast certainly took some of the hype out of me.
> Maybe there'll be a riddle today to help build the hype pressure.
> 
> Happy landings!

What time is it?

> 
> What time is it?

Well, where I live it's 6:30 on Saturday morning. But I don't think that's what you're asking.

The streams are supposed to start at 2:00 pm EDT.

Happy landings!

time zone
